Time Inc. The March of Time Audiovisual Collection
Time Inc. The March of Time Audiovisual Collection
The March of Time: War Breaks Out: Special Collector's Edition Box Set
The March of Time: War Breaks Out: Special Collector's Edition Box Set
One box set with six videocassettes. Included in the set:
1 videocassette (VHS) (118 min.): 1/2 in. Title: "The March of Time Presents War Breaks Out Americans Prepare Part 1"
1 videocassette (VHS) (113 min.): 1/2 in. Title: "The March of Time Presents War Breaks Out Americans Prepare Part 2"
1 videocassette (VHS) (107 min.): 1/2 in. Title: "The March of Time Presents War Breaks Out The Battle Beyond Part 1"
1 videocassette (VHS) (117 min.): 1/2 in. Title: "The March of Time Presents War Breaks Out The Battle Beyond Part 2"
1 videocassette (VHS) (124 min.): 1/2 in. Title: "The March of Time Presnts War Breaks Out The Military Prepares"
1 videocassette (VHS) (71 min.): 1/2 in. Title: "The March of Time Presents War Breaks Out Praying for Peace"
